title: Emails sent and received by José Luis Bermúdez

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Emails sent and received by José Luis Bermúdez
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

All emails sent and received by José Luis Bermúdez from June 12, 2023 through July 12, 2023.

Bermudez is the Interim Dean of the College of Arts & Sciences. His university profile can be found here: https://liberalarts.tamu.edu/philosophy/profile/jose-luis-bermudez/

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Ben Welsh

communications.subject: Texas Public Information Act Request: Harris County ShotSpotter Data
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the Texas Public Information Act, I hereby request the following records:

ShotSpotter reports in spreadsheet form for all ShotSpotter/SoundThinking activations from 2020 to present. I would like to receive information about the number of arrests, charges filed, number of victims, and the associated department report numbers in spreadsheet form as well.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Jaison Oliver

communications.subject: New York Freedom of Information Law Request: staff list
communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the New York Freedom of Information Law, I hereby request the following records:

a complete list of DHCR employees, including name, title, salary, and length of employment
a complete list of DHCR vacancies, including title, salary, and date of the vacancy's beginning

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 5 business days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Sam Mellins

To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

All emails, all written correspondence, LAUSD representatives exchanged with FBI pertaining to a claim and the investigation of a claim published in Venice Senior High's The Oarsman in an article titled "FBI Investigating Predators Targeting Online Accounts of Venice Students", published March 05, 2021.

The link to the specific claim of cyber crime is below.

This request includes any correspondence sent in reply and any possible initial messages sent by FBI to LAUSD in regards to a claim or any suspicion inspiring the following article in question:
https://veniceoarsman.com/10832/news/fbi-investigating-predators-targeting-online-student-accounts/
As such, the claim that individuals received solicitation for money, images, in a way that constitutes a crime was committed, communication records to local law enforcement, private investigators, FBI employees/agents/contractors should be provided, whatsoever record exists.
To successfully provide your record of messages exchanged between LAUSD (Los Angeles Unified School District) and FBI agents, employees, IC3, any contractor, investigator, police officer, names of any known victims proven to be a minor should be redacted sequentially as needed to provide the compiled records to the public.

In regards to the investigation detailed within the article referenced:
-I additionally request record of websites where alleged victim's accounts were located, and where accounts were searched for, and by whom. I am requesting record of when the accounts were accessed during an investigation, and when the accounts ceased being accessed totally by investigators. It would prove helpful to know when passwords were exchanged and how by providing correspondence record as they pertain.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Remy Noìchlaf
